amendment.description: At the end of division D, before the short title, insert the following: Sec. XX. The amounts otherwise provided by this Act are revised by reducing the amount made available for "Corps of Engineers-Civil--Construction", and increasing the amount made available for the same account, by $100,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 57 printed in House Report 115-259 to allocate an additional $100 million for Army Corps of Engineers construction projects related to flood control.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A037) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A037) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A037) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
